reviews.text: Amazing house and pool in a beatuiful surronding.
Everything was exactly like on the pictures. A little private paradise! And Gusti was very nice and helpful. Thank you so much!
I can only say that Made’s Treehouse is one amazing experience! Beside the amazing ocean and the beautiful beach nearby the Treehouse itself is marvellous! I can truly recommend this place!
Amazing place and fantastic people!Couldn’t ask for a better experience both from the place and the host.

Lovely tree house, great view, great vibe mainly n the 2nd floor.

Details that may be improved, the weird smell the bed and the couch in 2nd floor had was not nice!
The noise due to fixing the sealing next door. (2nd house)

But towels smelled great and pillows were very comfortable.

Despite the small details, Made was always responsive and willing to help out.

Nice, chill place.
Was just as described, very Beautiful and Peaceful

Balian Tree House is amazing - the garden with pool and the second floor of the house are great!
It was very private and everything was walking distance.

It was an amazing experience to spend few days at this beautiful house. The pool and the yard were very amazing, quite and styled.
The location is very close to everything. There is a nice coffee place just around the corner, the beach is by 3 min walking and very close there few nice restaurants. Because of that everything is so easy in balian beach.
About he house I can say that it has 2 rooms, one where you can sleep, and one where you can just chill with balcony, sofa.
There is also a desk and good internet connection for who need to work.
I’ve also worked during my stay and it was very smooth.
Not so good part about the house is the bathroom which is under the stairs, but was ok overnight
We also tried massage at the location actually 2 times, and was a very nice and good massage( for that you just need to discuss with Made and he will help you. The. menu is in the house with all types of massage.
So what i can say overall is that i really recommend this place for anyone!
This is a peaceful lovely place to stay . It is best for a single or couple . Gusti the driver recommended is excellent

We stayed 7 nights at the Tree House with my wife and we have one word for this place - HEAVEN! The place is amazing, beautiful garden with a pool, very cute restaurants around and everything walkable. Made was always responsive and taking care of everything we need. But the best part of the whole experience is every morning the sounds of the birds, it was unreal. TRUE PARADISE! We didn’t want to leave!!! The last day the owner even gave us present FREE massage. Thank you for everything!

We loved this treehouse! An oasis - a paradise! Did yoga every morning on the upper floor listening to the birds and the breeze. The pool was amazing and the garden smelled so good🙏🏼 Would love to go back!
Great place to feel like you are on a big adventure but in fact you have all you need around! Far away from noise and bustle of Bali, the ocean is 5 mins away, it was perfect for a break I needed.

Made and his team made our visit unforgettable! He was helpful, friendly and kind. The treehouse is the stuff dreams are made of and we left feeling refreshed which was the goal! Thank you for everything!
Gg

Made's place is unique and the garden and (shared) pool are beautiful. The house has everything you need and the upstairs lounge area is lovely but it's all quite well-used and weather worn now. It would be nice if the bedroom area wasn't so small. The addition of a water dispenser was much appreciated since you can't drink the tap water!!
The area is quiet and pretty and there's a fairly good range of restaurants for a small village but there isn't much to do beyond surfing. But if you're happy jut to relax by the pool like we were then Made's is great for that!
Made was very quick to reply and to help.
We thought the place was overpriced compared to other places we have stayed in Bali and given that the house could do with some updating.

Beautiful treehouse with lovely pool in quiet location. Beach is in walking distance and various cafes and restaurants close by. Made, the host is also very helpful and responsive. Perfect getaway into nature after spending time in busy Ubud.

Good: Great and responsive hosts. Unique property concept and design. Well maintained exterior and grounds. F&B within walking distance and can get spa treatments in villa.
Average: Interior is starting to age. The neighboring treehouses (under the same host) that are more recent have superior designs such as open air bathrooms, outdoor kitchens, dedicated pool, and more lighting.
Cons: Didn’t care for the location. Balian Beach is good for surfing but other neighborhoods have more diversity in activities.

Overall, recommend the property but wouldn’t return due to location. But if I did return, I’d choose their two newer listings over this.
Beautiful garden and quirky little treehouse!

Thank you for a wonderful stay Made.  Gusti was amazing, fetching me from the airport and showing me a little corner of Bali.  He is a wonderful guide.  I was able to leave feeling relaxed and rested. As an elderley woman travelling alone I was comfortable that I did not need to worry about anything.  Your place is lovely.

Perfect little seaside getaway for a nice little retreat. Location was a little tricky for our driver who was not familiar with the area but a quick call to Made got him back on track.

Exactly like the pictures, simple treehouse with the necessities. Spent a lot of time in the pool and in the cute cafes by the beach.

Perfect place to disconnect and listen to nature. Definitely recommend and will be back to stay.
Loved it! A nice bit of calk after a hectic week in seminyak and canggu. Would recommend
The most dreamy place! The host is so helpful, best place to get a massage and relax for a little bit. Heaven is indeed a place on earth
We enjoyed relaxing and getting away in this beautiful space.  Wish we had more time here. Very chill beach vibes nearby with a few restaurants.
Fantastic getaway for couples that want to spend several days off the beaten track. Five minute walk to the beach and great little cafés. Highly recommend it.
We had a great stay in Balian. Made’s flexibility was really appreciated. The two places we stayed at were just the kind of jungle hideaways we were looking for.

Miryam and Made are wonderful hosts, very helpful and accommodating. The treehouse with its beautiful garden is a dream. The location, quiet but still close to restaurants and the beach, is also very good. We were very satisfied and will gladly come back anytime!

This Balian treehouse is a small peice of paradise. Located in quiet, Balian beach, a small surfers town perfect for getting away from the touristic places in Bali. the treehouse has everything you need, including an incredible view and perfect pool. The beach is a 3 minute walk away, and Made helped us with everything we needed! Amazing stay, would definitely recommend!!
Super nice host, really helped us a lot. Took us from A to B a lot, randolmly picked us up from ATM, could contact whenever. Great host, would recommend!

We thought the house was nice, but did not feel like the listing was very accurate. In our opinion it didn’t look like what we were expecting, and it truthfully was very expensive for what we got. Other places we got breakfast, and were just a lot nicer for less. The hosts were super sweet and we appreciated them. Balian beach doesn’t have much but surfing and it’s a bit out of the way so keep that in mind. Overall wouldn’t recommend but please don’t feel like it’s a bad place to stay, just want to be honest.
Nice and quiet place exactly as described.  Beautiful and well kept garden.  The staff responded super fast.  Thanks.

Loved the stay here so much, it was relaxing and the nearby food options are delicious. A great way to wind down after an action packed start in Ubud. Spent a lot of time reading, swimming and relaxing! Made was even so kind as to allow us to stay on the property and use of the room on our checkout day as our flight wasn't until midnight.
The place is gorgeous, in a wonderful location, and the host and Made are amazing! So incredibly kind and helpful, anything we needed they were right there.

Made provided excellent  assistance in helping our taxi find the location, making check-in simple and easy.  He also provided a wonderful driver, Gusti, for our transfer to the next hotel.    Balian Beach is a lovely place with enough restaurants to provide variety and choices, yet quiet enough to feel restful.  The treehouse is a fun alternative to ordinary hotel rooms, we enjoyed hanging out upstairs in the open breeze and lounging in the lush garden by the pool.    We would love to return someday.
The place is espectacular for relaxing and Made is very kind and helpful.
Beautiful place and treehouse was even better than we thought it would be.

It was very nice, we enjoyed our calm stay. He was always available if we needed something. The Restaurants near by were great.
We were happy we could close the mosquito net around our bed , cause we are not used to the geckos 🦎
Thank you Made 🙏🏻
Good and responsible host!
Great property in great location. Made is very attentive and responsive to needs. Will def recommend for anyone looking for a unique place to get away from the busy city life.
Air bnb was cool. Quiet location. Host Made was so accomodating.
Gorgeous treehouse.

Made was a fantastic host and was always quick at responding and going above & beyond for us. Overall, we had a wonderful experience staying at the treehouse. It's a peaceful and quit place which is exactly what we needed.
Great little get away. Great Host.

Quirky upside down house in a fantastic location near to the beach. Made was lovely and helpful during check in and check out processes. The balcony was our favourite spot to sip a beer and read

Thank you Made!

I would highly recommend anyone who is thinking about booking to go ahead and do it. It looks just as amazing in person, as it does in the pictures. (I would recommend it even more to those who will be spending time in the pool, as spending time in and by the pool is one of the best ways to appreciate the scenery.)

The driver that the host can connect you with is also incredible. He is one of the kindest people I have ever met, and will accommodate to your needs. Although it costs extra, it is totally worth it to be picked up by him, rather than a random taxi.

WARNING: Please do not forget that this is a treehouse! There will be small insects that naturally come in as a result of its location. They are not bothersome whatsoever, but if a few small bugs inside your space bothers you, you should look elsewhere. The bathroom is not close to that of a hotel’s. Just keep all of the realities that come with such a beautiful outdoors in mind when booking.

Despite this, the AC and the water dispenser work very well making it extremely comfortable. The bed is also very clean and well-kept.

One you are there, the restaurants are a 5-10 minute walk away. I would highly recommend Tekor, as it has excellent food and great service.

Always feel free to reach out to the host with any questions. He is great at responding and is of great help.

Made’s place was absolutely beautiful! If you’re staying in Bailan Beach, this is the place to book. I felt so comfortable in this treehouse. I loved the design, the bedroom was super comfortable and the upstairs was a great way to relax, get a massage, and connect with the outdoors.

This treehouse is super special and really intertwines nature and the beauty of Bali. Bailan Beach is anywhere from an hour to two hours from Denpasar, Seminyak, Tabanan, Canggu, and Ubud so plan trips accordingly. There are no shopping centers, malls, Starbucks, or anything of the sort nearby! This is a great stay if you’re looking for something quiet and less touristy! It’s a local, small village experience and I loved every second of it. Great for surfing as well.

Made was a great host that made sure I had everything I needed. His communication was fast and he was there for anything I needed.

I enjoyed a brief walk to local cafes along the beach! It’s only 5 minutes away! If you want an extra fun scenery, please visit the secret cove restaurant! It’s a longer walk than the rest of the restaurants (15 minutes or so) but they served the most DELICIOUS food (the best food I EVER had in Bali) and it was a peaceful walk that was worth it. The staff were so kind and it was nice to be so close by. I walked along the cove of the beach and it felt secluded and beautiful. Beware along the way there may be dogs (there are many dogs in Bali) that bark at you but they are not aggressive and don’t attack.

If I am in Bailan Beach again, I’m definitely booking here again, hands down. Enjoy Bali, everyone! ❤️

We stayed at the Retro House, not at the Tree House. The owner is the same and they upgraded us. Retro House is truely amazing place! The design and architecture are made so smart, so all the details are very convenient and beautiful. Nice pool, lots of places to chill and work.

Balian beach is a gem, especially the right side with almost no people around and wonderful rocks.
There are a few restaurants there, all are very tasty but they accept mostly the cash only, so keep it in mind.

Thank you for taking care of us and for this beautiful getaway to the jungle!
Perfect for a trip within a trip. Great place to enjoy nature, sunset, and beach!

This greet house is incredible! This space has such an amazing vibe and personal touch. It’s just as advertised but even better in person. The grounds are kept very neat along with the gorgeous pool. Everything from the booking, check in and check out was incredible. I’ve stayed at many Airbnb’s all over the world and I can honestly say this was a wonderful experience. Everything was really great! I wish I could have stayed longer.

What an amazing stay we had here. The pool was perfect and really great to swim in after a long hot day exploring the area. The vibe of the little village was very relaxed with some great places to eat and drink. Do yourself a favour and book at least three nights.

Made & his Family amazing host
Very Kind helpful & Amicable.
We loved our stay & cant wait to come back here again. 🌌🙏🏼❤️❤️

Amazing stylish villa with a great hospitality and perfect location close to the Balian Beach. Quiet place is perfect for the couples. 5 min from the Balian beach (one of the best surf spot). Around a plenty bars and restaurants with nice food.

This place is unbelievable . The character you find in this tree house you won’t find anywhere else . The decor is amazing. The details are just marvelous . The pool is always at the perfect temperature. The hosts make you feel like family . As a seasoned traveler this is arguably one the top place I ever laid my head at. Thank you I will be back :)

We loved our stay! Made was excellent with communication. Property was beautiful . Amazing view from upstairs balcony. Air conditioning was excellent and a life saver as the heat is tremendous! Spent hours in the pool! The place also provided a large water dispenser that had cold, room temperature and hot water. That was a ++ bonus. Store is in walking distance as well as multiple restaurants. Only negative thing was you have to go through the bathroom to get upstairs which can be awkward at times but we made it work ok. Very highly recommended for a great, peaceful stay. Great value for the money!

Made’s Tree House was an incredible place to spend our first nights in Bali. He set us up with airport transfer that was there as we arrived. During the 2.5-3 hour drive from Denpasar, Gusti told us about things to do, eat, and see in Balian. Check in was easy, and we were exited to see that there was a water purifier in the room for our use. The house and surrounding area were clean, and the landscaping was immaculate.  We ate at Tekor Bali, Casa Balian Cafe, Toms Garden Cafe, Secret Bay, and a small warung on the left side of the road on the way into Balian Beach. We enjoyed the Warung for lunch, but Secret Bay was a bit disappointing. Do take the walk down to watch the sunset there though! Overall, Made’s place is quiet and laid back. Just the right atmosphere to recover from jet lag and enjoy your first few days in Bali. We cannot recommend it enough.
We loved the place! Pictures do this justice. Great bed. Proximity to the quite beautiful beach is nice... Close to restaurants and spa with views

Made is a great host. His reply was always fast and clear.

We had a lot of luggages (You can imagine if you travel with a baby or a toddler), when we arrived. He helped us carry them all the way through the garden to the room.

It is such a beautiful house with a fantastic garden and pool. Basically you can expect the house as described. Nothing really exaggerated. (I personally thought it looked a bit better online but probably my expectation was too high)

The only thing I found uncomfortable during our stay (2 nights) was that the water basin is quite small. And for those who are sensitive to privacy, the pool is semi-private(!)

Overall I recommend to stay here to completely relax. Enjoy this beautiful bamboo house!

It is a beautiful place, near to the beach and restaurants. The treehouse when you are on the 2nd floor balcony makes it feel like you are in the trees because of the contour of the land. It is nice to see the bird’s flying around. There are several cafes and restaurants on the way to the beach. The beach is a good for surfing for a couple or family who wants a nice day at the beach.

This is by far the best airbnb I have stayed in! My girlfriend and I had a splendid time in this magical villa, torn right off a magical fairytale. It for sure is more beautiful in person, than the pictures!

The pool was amazing, as well as the top floor. We were so flashed by everything, that we forgot to leave the key, but quickly resolved the issue with their driver, who ended up taking us on further trips for a fair price whilst sharing valuable insider tips!

Thank you wholeheartedly for this once in a lifetime Bali experience!
Excellent stay in a fab place - your own private pool - lots of  places to chill out - a sleepy beach village - with a handful of delicious restaurants
Very good place for chilling out.

If you want a place to relax and be away from city life, then this is the place. Aside from having a fantastic place to rest, you will have access to the beach, great restaurants, surfing, yoga, badminton etc. And when you do want to check out more of the island, then Gusti is the guy to go to. I highly recommended.
Super tranquil spot

We have a great time staying in the treehouse for a super relaxing couple of days and Made is a fantastic host. The space was really cosy and so nice to hang out in that we didn't do very much else. The pool is great for a refreshing dip after a hot walk and there's plenty of places to eat and drink very close by, including a night market 5 mins walk away with some of the best food we tried during our 2 week Indo trip. For me the highlight was also trying all the delicious fruit that grows in the treehouse garden!

The pictures are beautiful but the reality is even better! The space is larger than I anticipated and the upstairs had so many places to relax and read a book it was hard to choose. The house has a Swiss Family Robinson vibe with modern amenities. You can actually see the ocean from the upstairs as well which was a pleasant surprise.  Made arranged for me to be picked up in Kuta and several massages for me over the course of my stay. Could not have asked for a better host! The location itself is a sleepy beach town away from the hustle and bustle of places further south on the island which was exactly what I was looking for. The sunsets on Balian Beach were some of the best I have ever experienced. Book this Airbnb!
Truely THE paradise!

My partner and I live in Canggu but we wanted to escape the busy city and go for a unique getaway for his birthday. If you're looking for a peaceful getaway in a still untouched village in Bali, Balian village is perfect! We loved staying in the treehouse, reading on the balcony and waking up to the sound of the ocean in the morning. There are also a few restaurants a few minutes away from the Airbnb which makes the stay even easier. On top of that, a great bonus was having your own water tank in the room. The host is also very accommodating and very helpful with arranging everything :) We wish we could stay longer but we will definitely come back!

Excellent service, thanks Made! Great space and location. Many cafes/restaurants to choose from nearby. Air con is great and so is the filtered water in the room. Pool is beautiful, surrounded by greenery! Bagus!

We absolutely LOVED this spot. We wished it would have been available for us to stay longer.

Made was absolutely amazing, helpful, and certainly went above and beyond to make sure our stay was more then we had expected. Plus the recommended private driver Gusti not only picked us up from Ubud, but also drove us to Canggu after our stay for a very reasonable price!

The decor and small detailed touch’s in the space made it not only interesting but comfortable. The small kitchen was a nice and even had a French press for coffee in the morning, the bathroom was incredibly spacious, and the upstairs treehouse was the perfect place to just zen, read a book and feel the ocean breeze on an incredibly hot day after a dip in the pool.

There were multiple places to eat, we particularly loved the Casa Balian. Great coffee, and many fresh, healthy options. Only a 4 minute walk from the treehouse.

Though we don’t surf, we enjoyed sitting out near the beach just to watch. The town is very quiet with many pups roaming around, there was a yoga studio by beach and everyone wears so friendly.

We had an amazing time in the Balian Treehouse. The garden and the pool are just amazing, like a little paradise. You can see that they really take care of everything. Made was just fantastic, whatever we wanted to know or needed help with he was immediately there for us. Thank you so much, we will definitely come back.

We stayed at the tree house for one night and it was extremely cool. We were staying in Canggu before so this was a bit of a change as it’s very quiet and not a lot to do but chill out, hit the beach. There’s not a lot around and only about 5 restaurants that are in walking distance. Great place to sit back and chill out

100% recommend! The treehouse is only a 5 minute walk away from the beach and all the restaurants on it. It is a perfect place in Bali to relax, far from the hustle and bustle.
Made and his family keep the place looking truly beautiful. We got to meet Mario & Miryam who are just as lovely.
The service was impeccable & very attentive.
Hope to come back.

Made has been exceptionally helpful during our trip to Bali. He helped arrange drivers for us and was incredibly quick to respond when we needed anything or had any questions. The treehouse and grounds were immaculate. Thank you so much, Made!! I highly recommend the treehouse to anyone visiting Balian Beach!

This treehouse is one of the most beautiful sights we have seen. The views are stunning and the treehouse is everything you could want for a peaceful getaway. Made was very friendly, always asking if we needed something. The location is right near a beach. It was very peaceful in comparison to the rest of what we had seen in Bali. Yet not derelict to the point where you were limited for restaurants etc. We throughly enjoyed our stay, the photos are completely accurate and it’s a true sceptical. We highly recommend this accommodation. Thanks Made for welcoming us to Balian Beach.

I recommend the treehouse to anyone looking for a tranquil beach getaway! My husband and I stayed here for a couple of nights on our honeymoon and wish we could have stayed longer. 2 nights is not enough!

We used Gusti (per Made’s suggestion) as our driver and he was prompt and on-time to pick us up from our hotel over 2 hours away. When we arrived at the treehouse, we were greeted by Made and were shown where to find everything we needed and more in the property.

The bed was extremely comfortable and we both got great sleep. The shower was lovely, and all the linens provided were clean, smelled delightful, and soft to the touch. The property and treehouse were very well kept, clean, and BEAUTIFULLY decorated. There are so many little touches added to the property, and you can see all the hard work that was put into making the treehouse what it is.

The pool was a great place to cool off after a long and hot day in Balian Beach, and the treehouse was just a few minutes walk from the beach and wonderful restaurants. Our favorites were Takor Bali and Sushi Surf, which were both basically right down the road.

We hope to return again and stay at the treehouse again or at one of Made’s other properties. This was by far the best Airbnb we have ever stayed in, and highly recommend staying here!

Overall I wasn’t blown away as other reviewers have stated. I found the place to be cute at best. The description of the room is a bit misleading with the title ”Treehouse”. I have stayed in treehouses before and this is definitely not a treehouse. A better description would be “cabana”. The room was a bit dark and ”rustic”. The grounds did not look like the photos. The photos depict a lush green well maintained space. I understand it is dry season but even considering that the space didn’t seem well maintained. I would have been more satisfied with my experience if I had paid in the $50 a night price range but with a price tag of $100 my expectations were not met. In my opinion there are many beautiful places in bali and even Balian that offer better value for your money.

The treehouse was definitely that - a treehouse in the jungle so expect the occasional critters (bugs/lizards). With that said, the place was clean and the service was great! Cute restaurants nearby however the beach is mostly for surfing not laying. Overall relaxing and unique place to stay in Bali.
Nice place near to the beach. Need to spend longer days. Easy to get halal food for moslem. The house is very peaceful and the pool is amazing.
Incredible place!

The treehouse is amazing!! What a lovely place to get away and chill at. I wish I would have had more time to enjoy this little slice of heaven. The vibes here are HELLA real and you will not regret staying here. Very close to local food and the beach. Made was great and helped out with a driver when I needed.
Amazing location minutes away from the beach. Very quiet and secluded so it was amazing for relaxing. Made was a great host, super easy to get a hold of on WhatsApp. Highly recommended!

I had a great stay (6 nights) at the tree house, and enjoyed the beach close by just as much as the pool available at the property. Location was great, close to lots of cafes and restaurants, I explored the area around Balian Beach, Secret Bay and beyond Pantai Mejan. August was a good time to visit as the weather was lovely, not many mosquitoes and lots of sunny days. I’m only sad my holiday was so short. :)

If you are thinking of booking this place, think no longer & book it before someone else does!!

Honestly this place was a highlight of our honeymoon, we travelled from the UK with zero accommodation booked bar this treehouse in the middle of our holiday because they were the last available dates when we’d looked months in advance while scrolling this site. We literally planned our honeymoon around this stay! And it superseded our expectations!!

We were running late on check in after making our journey from Gilli islands, it was gone 9pm by the time we arrived, but Made was there to help us with our bags and to check us in, he even had suggestions as to the restaurants still open if we hadn’t had dinner (which we hadn’t).

You share a pool with one other of their houses (the glass house, another listing) however we didn’t see one person, whenever we were in pool or on balcony we were (or felt) totally secluded. You can hear the waves from the balcony & will easily lull you to sleep if you let it.

Although we felt like we were the only ones there, when we had found we’d used all the ground coffee they’d supplied, a WhatsApp message to Made meant it was refilled within 5mins!! Also one of the days while enjoying pool, Made walked by and prepared us a coconut to drink that had just fallen from tree! He also made arrangements for our further travel to Ubud after we’d checked out, so if needed they are there to accommodate whatever you need.

All the amenities were there if you wanted to cook, however with their map of bars and restaurants a short walk away you had no reason to! They have a water machine with boiling, room temperature, and ice cold options. Brilliant idea!
The air con was the best we had in Bali by a long way! The bed & pillows were so comfy, and with a soft thin quilt compared to sheets was a nice touch!

The decor is exactly what you see on the listing, bright colourful and quirky. Very in keeping with its surroundings can, the grounds were amazingly well kept, we spent a lot of the time saying to each other “have you seen that plant over there” ahah

I’ve thought really hard to critique this place and cannot for the life of me find one fault or improvement that could be done.

We will be back again ❤️❤️❤️❤️
Such a special place - our two days went far too quickly.
Great place to stay, enjoyed our honey moon very much. Recommend very much!!!!

The new villa on lower section of land is new, open, light and spacious. The villa I was put in was small and dark.  Too expensive compared to other accommodation in this area.  Area is bit like the old Bali, with some nice restaurants.  No shops. So bring snacks, drinks, etc unless you have your own transport.  Nothing to see or do unless you surf, but as a short break from the hassle of Kuta, Balian Beach it is a wonderful spot.
A paradise

We are from United States and on night 3 of our 8 night honeymoon- first night we got in at 1 am at Densapar and by the time we got through customs it was 2:30 am- the front of airport was confusing with taxis and shuttles- limited american/English interpretations and since maps looked like Hilton Garden Airport was just across Street we decided to walk.... probably should have broke down and paid 4 bucks as it was a little jaunt.

Night 2 was at a boutique resort with about 8 other units- all a paradise but not a lot of privacyas you could hear people talking from all outside points...not at the Treehouse.

Upon arrival we met Made and he instantly lifted up the vibe as we were still adapting to the 16 hour time difference.

He escorted us to the treehouse and as we were getting hungry he helped us order food delivery which was about 5 minutes away and I ordered a pizza and my bride got the chicken and rice...was both AWESOME and I think it was like 200,000 or $12 bucks.

The bed had net coverage and even though the room had areas exposed to outside the net made my wonderful bride content. She fell asleep and I wanted to enjoy every second so I was going for a midnight swim.

Was more cozy sitting on the bamboo covered sunbed- taking it all in- the sounds, the warm coastal breeze and the strategically placed lights that created a resort feeling gleaming from pool.

Next morning we trekked down to Ocean- about 7 minute walk and passes locals- all with smiles and warm greetings. Some roosters crackling and about half way to the oceanfront there is a little pet monkey that someone owns- it's tied up to a tree so was kinda sad- glad we saw the wild ones later.

The waterfront area is a 7 minute walk-had a few surf shops for rentals, a few different yoga studios, a couple massage places (about $12/hr US), coffee shops and great surf beach.

We got a late check out and enjoyed the "privacy" of the pool- even ordered 6 Bintang's from same restaurant that we ate dinner and delivered within minutes and was like $3.00 beer!

We stayed at 7 places in 8 nights and this was one of the best.... we stayed at another Airbnb Ocean Front in Puta, At Double Six in Seminyak, A mansion in Ubud and a resort spot in Nusa Dua on last night.

One night wasn't enough at this place- and the Funky House next door- no one was there but if we had another couple that we could hang with for a week- it would be the perfect place.

Beautiful place
Made the host was more then willing to help me with cake and flowers for me gfs birthday and cant thank him enough
The tree house was beautiful so quiet and felt safe the whole time loved it!!

After spending a crazy week in Seminyak & then spending our last week at the treehouse in Balian Beach was the most relaxing way to finish of our holiday as this place still holds what Bali is all about. Beautiful food, people & culture.Will definitely be back & can't stop telling our friends all about the treehouse. Coolest place to chill out in.

Made was very very welcoming and helped us with every single (even minor) issue we had. Villa is much more beautiful than on the photos (I know it’s unbelievable:) ). Balian village is one of the most beautiful and relaxing places we’ve visited during our 3rd stay in Bali. Don’t think more - book it!)
Lovely spot with shared pool.
This place is pretty epic. If you love the relaxed surfer vibes this pace is for you.

Well. This place is exactly as it looks in the pictures, incredible. The place is goooorgeous. A bit hard to find, but an amazing private oasis (pool is shared with another house). Bed is sooo comfy, and there’s hot water. We booked the place for 4 nights, but unfortunately only stayed for one. We had never been to Bali before, so didn’t really understand where anything is located. The Airbnb itself is a 7 min walk to a quiet black sand surfing beach. However, it is located on Balian beach which is a ways away from everything else in Bali. (about 2 hour drive from Ubud with traffic, 3-4 hours to airport). None of the excursions we booked were able to pick us up from the area, so if you’re looking to explore Bali and have a trip full of activities - this may not be the best place. However, if you’re looking for a fun private and romantic getaway, this is it! Also, the area is super safe and you can walk to plenty of restaurants.

Made’s treehouse is stunning and just like the photos! The rooms and pool are kept clean and very private. The location is very quiet, perfect for a relaxing getaway with a few nice restaurants nearby. Me and my partner thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would recommend to anyone!

We stayed in 3 different places in Bali during our trip and the Treehouse was definitely the best out of the 3! Great host took their time out to have a chat with us to settle us in and give us all the necessary help to allow us to make the most of our holiday. Highly recommended. We will be back for sure.

Balian Beach is an exquisite vacation escape.  This is a place where you can truly unwind.  We often walked the beach and only saw a few local fisherman and a couple surfers on the waves.  There are plenty of great restaurants in easy walking distance and if you can get up early the morning, the fruit market is outstanding.  We also highly recommend Bella Spa and massage.  The space is a little quirky, but the massage is fantastic and you really can’t beat the sound of the surf in the background.  If you need to do any transport, use the recommended driver Gusti.  He is knowledgeable, friendly and very punctual.  This is a fantastic place.  We recommend both the tree house and the funky glass house (amazing outdoor first floor).  Great place all around!

The Balian treehouse was a wonderful experience. Everyone was very friendly around the neighbourhood. We had massages on the beach and we definitely recommend going to the night market for good,local and cheap eats. Get the fried chicken! Nice and clean private pool. Just a few minutes walk to the beach. We really enjoyed ourselves.

Just want to inform future travellers that this is not an actual treehouse and that the garden and pool facilities are shared with another on-site house. Other than that, Made is a fantastic host. Thank you!

Also, Balian beach as a location in itself, is just for surfing and relaxing. Not too much else to do in this little coastal town.

We loved the balian beach treehouse! It was a great start to our honeymoon. The house is so unique and there are so many great local restaurants to choose from that are just a short walk away. What a great location. Thank you to Made, Gusti, and Miryam for making our stay so great!
A beautiful and peaceful getaway and wonderful hospitality!

The photos of the Mades place are amazing and even better in real life. Walking up to the tree house was surreal. It’s your own private oasis.

If you want to feel like you are in your own private treehouse this place is for you.

Added bonuses - excellent wifi and HBO on demand if you need a little technology to wind down at night

Lots of restaurants a short walk away towards the ocean. If you are comfortable renting a scooter you are good to go

Great place. Tough to leave it behind

Made's treehouse is spectacular! It is just as the pictures and truly a magical space. Made is very kind and quickly responds to messages.  The driver they use, Gusti, is also very kind and extremely helpful for transportation. The pool is fantastic and the beach is less than a 5 min walk away. There are also many restaurants before you get to the beach and right on the beach. No motorbike necessary. I only stayed 2 nights but wish I could have stayed longer. I will be back for sure....highly recommend this place!!

A great place for relaxation and amazing Balian hospitality. Such a laid back atmosphere with great surfing and dining options. Honestly, we could have stayed at Made's place the whole time, considering the beauty of the property and the amenities. Made was such a genuinely nice individual, always wanting and willing to make our time in the area enjoyable. Definitely a suggestion of ours!
The only negative I have to say is this is not an actual treehouse. I was expecting a treehouse masters type treehouse. This is just a house in the trees.

This was our first top for our Bali adventures and we couldn't have picked a better place to begin. Really quiet location was perfect to shake off the jet-lag. Beautiful property, pool was perfect temperature, excellent bed, great A/C, plenty of fresh drinking water. 3 minutes walk to get to the beach, and 2 minute walk to some great local restaurants.

Great communication with host. Made gave us a lot of great local tips, was great with communication while in Balian Beach, cut us open some fresh coconuts, and introduced us to a great surf instructor (Eddie). Gusti was our pickup from the airport (2am? no problem), and we even used him for some Ubud adventures. He showed us some great local spots. Both Made and Gusti became instant friends to us.

Beautiful Villa in a serene, quiet location in Balian Beach. Very short walk to the beach, beautiful sunsets. Made was very prompt and responsive to all questions. Really enjoyed our peaceful stay here

This place is simply amazing. Secluded, quiet beautifull close to the beach and a couple of nice restaurants and especially the top Floor is so nice. We zoent Hours Just relaxing and chilling there. Perfect place to wind down

This place is a ABSOLUTELY beautiful! It is exactly like the pictures. I loved waking up every morning and walking down to the restaurant (3 min walk) for breakfast and then going to the balcony to enjoy the view. It is so peaceful and serene. It is in a village and a bit far away from the main attractions, but made can arrange a driver to take you there. The drivers were so nice and gave a lot of ideas and places to go. The only thing we ran into was there was heavy rain and with it the power went out for a couple hours at night, but that's expected everywhere with a storm. We were there celebrating my daughter's birthday and Made decorated beautifully with balloons and arranged a cake. He was also able to arrange for an in house massage upon arrival. His hospitality went above and beyond. I would absolutely recommend this treehouse to everyone, it is a must stay.

Mades place is a quiet villa that is perfect for a getaway from the hastle of the tourist hotspots. Fair priced restaurants are just down the street. For a budget dinner, you can also take a walk to the night market. The pool is shared with another villa on the same property.

The villa is too authentic and traditional. So far from touristic areas (more than 2 hours by car from Kuta). Also you can find white lizards and bugs inside. It is not dangerous. So hard to find the way to villa be maps, always ask Made to help. No beach for swimming in this areas, but great beach with black sand for surfing. Good europenian cafes nearby. Nice place for surfing tourists. Wonderful garden and big and clean pool.

The Balian Treehouse will be a recommendation to anyone traveling to Bali looking to unwind. The accommodations are inviting and colorful. The upstairs loft is perfect for lounging, with views of a lush garden & pool. AC & WiFi worked very well. Cold or hot filtered water, coffee & tea included as part of the kitchenette. Made was available and thoughtful during the stay.

The location is ideal for those seeking a unique hidden beachside town~ easy walk to many great dining options, cafes and surf rentals.
This place was absolutely incredible. Holy moly.

My husband and I really wanted to get away from the hectic part of Bali and spend a few days up the coast. This beautiful house and environment was definitely a breath of fresh air. If you want to experience an authentic, beautiful, relaxing time in Bali, this is the place to go. With Balian beach just a minute scooter ride away, it’s perfect if you want to spend time surfing or doing some yoga. The house itself is cute and comfy, but if you’re afraid of the cutest geckos ever then maybe it’s not the place for you. You might find one of them inside the house, as you would in a lot of places in Bali (I personally love geckos and think they’re one of the best parts of Bali). Next time we come, we really want to stay in the bigger house with the private pool...it looked amazing. Made was an awesome host and we couldn’t ask for anything better. Thank you so much!

Astounding isnt an overuse of hyperbole here!

We LOVED! the Treehouse & Pool

Everything from the picture perfect location to the attention to detail.

From Made helping us all the way to Miryam's generosity.

Cant forget Gusti for the Taxi services either (Trust me, he is the man for transport)

If you are looking for a getaway, this is simply it!

Never been more relaxed on any holiday ever.

We WILL! be back.

Scott

PS. Wait till you see the Sunsets & the Surf!

Made is an amazing host and as helpful and attentive as you could expect. He was super responsive to messages leading up to and during the stay and very accommodating of any requirements. The tree house itself is amazingly tucked away and hidden off the main roads but close enough to convenience stores in one direction and beachside restaurants in the other. Air con in the bed room is perfect for sleeping with and all the amenities (kitchen, toilet, bathroom) are well kept and sufficient for long or short stays. Upstairs provides an open style chill out zone / work space as well as a balcony furnished with a swing chair + double lounge bed overlooking the tree canopy and pool below. The pool is open and receives brilliant sunlight whilst is also surrounded by plenty of shade in either the Balinese hut or on a day bed under any number of trees. There are 1 or 2 other tree houses in the same vicinity though privacy was not an issue at all as plenty of trees separate the space. Finally, the wifi is fast and reliable and bed is extremely comfortable. Overall this was an amazing and peaceful stay and well worth the trip to Balian. I can’t wait to visit again some day.
Will comeback again

the place is amazing. Even more beautiful than pictures. Though it is few minutes walk from beach but at night the streets become too scary as there are no street lights. Made was a great host and was always a text away. He really made our stay comfortable.

We had a very nice experience staying at Made’s place. Obviously, this is a beautiful treehouse with a nice little garden with pool. It is close to the Balian Beach and a few small restaurants & massage places. It is tucked away from the busier areas of Bali, so if you’re seeking a more secluded space with access to a black sand surfing spot, this is ideal for you!

The house was nicely appointed with a comfortable bed and powerful A/C. There is also a small kitchenette for light cooking and a water machine which dispenses filtered drinking water (hot and cold). It is a very peaceful place with little disturbance or noise. Made was a good host, checking our needs and even organized a driver to pick us up from our hotel in Ubud who was also very nice & reasonable. Made was responsive to my messages and is available through WhatsApp which makes it easy to communicate as a traveler. I would stay here again!

This truly is paradise. The treehouse is on a small dirt road in a small surf town far from the hustle and bustle of Kuta and Denpasar. It is authentic Balinese living with a private pool and an air conditioned bedroom. Surfing and local restaurants with inexpensive and delicious food are a mere minutes from your getaway. Stay here, you will not regret it.

as shown in pictures. very beautiful property. Host Made is very polite & always available for help & support.

The tree house is amazing, pool is super good, very quiet and relaxed environment.

It is located near Balian beach which is best for surfers not for general tourists (unless they wish to remain in super quiet & relaxed environment). the location has local network issues, WiFi issues and there is no local market. For food one has to walk around 150-200 meters for cafes. Also there are only 3-4 cafes on the beach.

During night walking to the restaurants is very creepy as there are no lights and dogs come running towards you while barking.

Overall, we had a funtime during our honeymoon. No cellular network No wifi availability didn't bother us much, we used to use Cafe's wifi.

recommendations for travelers:

Do stock up from Alfa Mart or Any market before check-in, if you don't have personal vehicle hired.

The to and fro from Airport or south Bali to Balian will cost you around 10,00,000 IDR of $70.

There are no nearby tourist attractions, all attractions are around 1-2hrs drive. The cab costs around $70 for 2 hrs to and fro drive. The place is in West Bali.

Made is super awesome but he is not available all the time on the property, one has to call him, but without cellular network and wifi network it gets tricky.

the place is romantic & a treasure for couples/family who surf.
even better than on the pictures. made was a super friendly host. we couldn't have wished for more. highly recommended :)

It is like a little secret garden. So beautiful and close enough to walk to the beach too. Made is a very warm-hearted host. Reply message very fast. Booking the car for us to the airport. We enjoyed the House; the views and the pool. I will go back again.

This place is amazing!! If you’re considering booking - don’t think, just do it. The pool was beautiful, and the views from the upper level of the treehouse were stunning. So relaxing and calm surrounded by nature. Also, the local restaurants and vibrant sunsets are only a mere 2-3 minute walk away. Head to toe - this place was fabulous and Made’s hospitality made it that much better!! Only stayed one night but don’t make the same mistake, book more :)

Such a great place to completely relax, and Made is an absolute gem to have around taking care of his guests needs
24/7 Pretty Amazing

Amazing place, peaceful and relaxing. Great hosts, 5 mins walk from the beach with a range of cafes and restaurants nearby. One of the best places we've stayed in. Great communication from Made and the team.

Made was a great host. Everything was well thought out and he offered suggestions for things outside of the compound. There is a net to cover while you sleep however we still had a creepy crawler come into bed with us. It is a treehouse surrounded by nature so that is to be expected. Otherwise we had a fantastic stay.
We had a great time in Balian beach. The treehouse was great and it’s a short walk to a beautiful and relaxing beach

lovely place, beautiful garden and close to the beach and restaurants. Garden and pool shared with another property that is open sided (glasshouse) so not private but a lovely stay none the less! Made is also a great host. Would recommend!

The Balian Treehouse is in a beautiful spot and Made is helpful and friendly. However it is NOT 'Made's place' and I think for those who make an effort to support locally owned businesses to say it is is misleading. The garden and pool are clean and attractive  but guests should know that these are shared with another guesthouse. I don't think the website makes this clear. The Treehouse is wonderfully quiet and there are good restaurants and nice beaches nearby. For some guests (eg older guests) comfort would be improved by having some more practical furniture.  Thanks Made.

The house and yard is really beautiful and I like the 2nd floor more sitting on the sofa having some drinks. It’s just super cozy!
Balian beach is “crazy” , big wave lol! So impressive.
We had an awesome stay. Great location, great atmosphere. Made and Gusti offered us an excellent service. If you are planning to visit balian beach, this is the place to be!

Our trip to the Balian Beach Treehouse was fantastic. It is a beautiful, natural house that really was as stunning as the photos. Balian Beach is also a lovely and quiet small surf village that I wish I could have spent a few more days at. If you are a surfer, or want a taste of a laid back part of Bali, I would highlight recommend visiting. Made, who manages the property, was very kind and easy to work with through the whole process.

Gusti, the driver that the host arranged our transfers with was very nice, very informative on the ares and was very competitively priced especially vs other local guides. He went out of his way to accomodate us (even with a last minute early morning travel request) and was always on time. I would highly recommend using him to get to and from this location!

All in all this place gets 5/5 stars from me!
a charming treehouse with awesome hosts!
Beautiful treehouse and garden. Close to the ocean. Great hospitality

The house is very pretty and in a great location when interested in surfing or just relaxing at the (private) pool in a quiet balinese neighbourhood with very good restaurants nearby. The parking space was quite impractical when arriving with your own rental car, as the road leading to tree house is very narrow and difficult to drive even in daylight. Communication with the host and check-in /check-out we're easy and convenient. Might be a little overpriced when compared to similar Airbnb's in Bali, but definitely a great place to stay!

The treehouse was a wonderful getaway. Balian is a small community that is away from the hustle and bustle. It was a great place to relax. A private location made it feel as though we were alone in the tropical environment!

A unique accommodation, basic kitchen and bathroom facilities but the incredible upstairs and outdoor living space more than made up for this.
The beach, small market and smaller supermarket a short walk away. Great local restaurants nearby that are very reasonably priced.
The host and locals are amazingly friendly and welcoming.
A fantastic experience!
Beautiful Treehouse, with a fantastic view. we loved our stay there. Lovely shared pool. We had an awesome time chilling out at the local bars and restaurants.

We had a great time in the Balian tree house. Wonderful house, wonderful garden, very nice people - Made is a great host. Balian beach is a very, very nice place if you don't expect party time during your vacation.
Unfortunately the situation with the earthquake on Lombok island took us to leave Bali earlier. But maybe we'll be back sometime.

My partner Callum and I stayed at the treehouse for 2 weeks. From the moment we arrived we felt welcomed and cared for by Made. He was in contact with us from the moment we landed in the airport and kept in touch with our taxi driver (Gusti) and waited for us to arrive at the house (3 hours later than expected). Made truly makes this house a home and is eager to help in any way he can. He goes above and beyond to make sure that your holiday is everything you wished for. His family is equally as lovely and even surprised me with a homemade birthday cake and a present during our stay!

The house itself is clean (within limits of being immersed in plantlife) and offers enough space for relaxing and making the most of the grounds. Made cleaned the Treehouse daily and was available 24/7 for anything we needed.
We will definitely be returning to see Made and his family again, as well as the local driver Putu, whom we highly recommend for day trips and excursions. He was a great driver and humble, offering knowledge and the history of the local attractions and culture. He is well priced and is relaxed too, which for us was exactly what we were looking for when going on a full day trip to Ubud etc.
We did use the cooking facilities in the house, and made use of the night market, which has a small supermarket too for everything you need. A few locals also suggested the warungs there in the evening for food. We loved Tekor Bali (restaurant) and the staff are wonderful- the food is excellent and the prices are reasonable.

We have been home a few days now and are already itching to come back to this wonderful place. If you are looking for a welcoming place to stay with an abundance of relaxation and beauty then this is the place for you.

Miryam was an amazing host, even though we did not meet in person she made sure our needs were met. She was very considerate and understating, quick in responding to all my questions and requests. Her hospitality was amazing and her houses are beautiful.

Our stay could not have been made more comfortable and easy if it was not for MADE. Made in my opinion is probably one of the most resourceful men in Bali. You name the service that you want and he will make sure you have the best of what you asked for. Some of the services we requested (in house massages, taxi services, laundry, tours, etc)


I am very happy, I was able to find an open spot in their very busy schedule and I would definitely stay there again for some peace and tranquility.

The Villa is amazing! Just like in the photos.:D
We loved to stay on the balcony and look over the tropical garden and the wonderful pool.
We also liked Balian Beach and the nice people there.
Would stay here again!

Made's place was amazing! Gorgeous property and such a friendly host. He even helped my boyfriend when he was sick - getting local medicine for him in the middle of the night. So hospitable. And the property was a short, easy walk to the beach and cute local restaurants. We would highly recommend to anyone!
The treehouse is adorable, clean and comfy. Great vibes! Just a short walk to the beach. Made is a great host, incredibly kind and helpful.
A great place to chill. Away from tourist area but still a few nice places to eat. Made was a very good host and happy to help with whatever was needed.

My husband and I had a wonderful stay. It was such beautiful landscape. The bed was fantastic and they provided every need possible for us. Owners very friendly and the house was beautiful .  Highly recommend! We took advantage of their very friendly driver who was more like a tour guide friend than a taxi driver. Thanks Gusti!

The night time view from the tree house on the pool and garden is magical - like a scene from a Guillermo del Toro movie. One of the less scary ones! It’s a wonderful experience. The house itself is quirky but comfortable and if you’re at all into surfing, the waves are terrific. Plus you get the wonderful Made - a natural problem solver and charmer.

Beautiful, private space close to Balian Beach - there is a 3 hour trip to the airport so make sure you leave 6+ hours to make your flight (as there are very few roads in / out)! Honestly you need about 6 to get back to airport, just in case there are bus breakdowns in front of you. Also travel lightly / don't bring a lot of bags.

Made, Miryam and Gusti (driver) made my stay an absolute pleasure. VERY close to the beach - I took the roundabout way of waking once, which was also beautiful and only took about 12 min. However the "secret" path to the beach (immediate left as soon as you're on the road from your room) only takes 4-5 min walk as promised. You are RIGHT near the beach.

The garden, pool and treehouse were simply stunning. Really beautiful, peaceful and serene. They look exactly like the photos.

There were some ants that found their way into the treehouse however (and I had some food around too which I wrapped up) - they really kept to themselves though and did not even come near the bed. Really "polite" ants (haha) and I'm sure this is nothing that your hosts couldn't take some spray to fully eradicate. (I didn't want a lot of bug spray so I didn't ask - AND I was able to use the excellent mosquito net to sleep bug-free, even though it wasn't high season for mosquitoes). VERY helpful.

I've been to India and Costa Rica so I'm familiar with traveling in different countries where you're not going to get the "Sands Resort"-style of vacation (sometimes there are bugs / sometimes you have to be careful not to use too much water when you shower [though this was not a problem at the treehouse], and make sure you drink bottled water) - so this place was really beautiful, one of a kind, secluded, private and welcome to me. They also provided a 5-gallon bottled water installation for drinking in the room.

The beach was FANTASTIC - the food at the beach was really good - get a fresh coconut with a straw, hang out, surf, it's amazing.

The treehouse was everything the photos exude but even more impressive in actuality. Made is a most gracious host and responded immediately to any request or question whether food, massage, drivers. I would return in a split second. Of all the places I have been on the planet this is one of the most memorable and unique homes of which I have ever experienced. You will not regret the choice!
We had great stay at Made’s Tree House. The natural environment is so great. Made and Gusti are super helpful. Definitely want to come back again!
Great place to check out for a short time, enjoy the waves and live a simple life

Made’s property in Balian Beach feels out of a dream. With the beautiful garden and pool is offers seclusion, but the beach is also just a short walk away.
The beach is absolutely stunning, a black sand beach were you can watch both the sunrise and sunset, go surfing, or just relax. There are also plenty on restaurants to eat at in the town. I recommend Tekor Bali, it’s the restaurant I ate almost all of my meals at. Made was very accommodating and always around to make sure I was enjoying my stay.

This Airbnb will always hold such a wonderful place in our hearts - we got married on the property! Our hosts were so beyond accommodating and we couldn't be more thankful for them not only allowing us to be married on their property, but going out of their way to make our experience as seamless and beautiful as possible.

Their hospitality was incomparable and this airbnb is even more beautiful than in the photos. Balian Beach is so relaxing and is our new idea of paradise. If you are considering booking the Treehouse or the Treehouse 2 (also, so gorgeous!!), don't hesitate! Not only will you have a relaxing and beautiful experience at this location, you will be among some of the most kind and caring people.

We hope to return with a whole family next time! :)
Beautiful location with amazing hospitality and a unique Bali experience to be sure. We loved every minute of it!
Beautiful Treehouse built with attention to details and designed with love. I loved the space and Made is a smart, fun, loving and helpful person.
Amazing hosts and property! Were beyond helpful with any issues we had in Bali not even involving the rental.
Fantastic accommodation. Loved staying in the treehouse. Made is extremely friendly and helpful!

The place is amazingly beautiful the garden is so tropical and so well looked after. Me and my girl friend enjoyed swimming in the pool on hot days and watching movies in the treehouse in the rain. We hired a scooter for the three days and ate at the sushi restaurant on the beach almost everyday which is awesome. We went surfing and enjoyed massages and breakfast at the secret bay which is such a cool spot for lots of photos. Made a local is extremely helpful and does such a great job. Highly recommend this place
Magical place,  in the most beautiful setting.  Made always there for anything we needed,  laundry,  massages, coconuts!  A very memorable place :) We will see Balian again.

I'll not write about the house, simply check the pictures it even looks better than that. The area is so relaxing and the house is near the beach and there are few restaurants within 5 min walk. Around 10 min away from the main road where you can find ATMs, pharmacy and mini market. Made is a great host, helpful and will do his best to make you enjoy your stay. Gusti the driver is also nice and a good tour guide.

The pictures don't even do this place justice. What a home. Located right down the way from beautiful Balian Beach, this is THE spot on Bali if you are looking to be a beach bum for a few days. Made, Miriam, and Mario are some of the most generous and caring hosts I have ever had.  For example, during my stay here, there were contractors working on a small construction project nearby. Not a problem in the slightest. People work in the world. It was not bothersome. Made and Miriam were so concerned with making sure my fiance and I had an exemplary stay, that they sent a duo of massage therapists to the Treehouse free of charge to make up for any disturbance we may have experienced (which was none. We aren't that picky, but we LOVED the massages all the same). Other touches made our stay a step above yje regylar. Made came by during a swim and cut open fresh coconuts from the garden for us to drink. The nearby locals invited us for drinks and songs with a local rock band during the evening. All in all, our stay was beyond exmplary. Highly recommend.

This lovely Treehouse was exactly what I needed. The slower pace of a surf village with the most wonderful host (Made- no surprise he’s a superhost!). Answered each of my questions promptly and took care of me as if I were family. My driver Gusti was also amazing. He instructed me how long it would take to reach the places I wanted to visit and what times would be best to go. I can’t thank you all enough for my wonderful week in Balian.

We had a wonderful stay at the tree house. Great place to relax and enjoy the nature. The communication was easy and they helped wit transportation (Gusti taxi recommended). If you are looking for a special experience, choose this AIRBnB!

Made's place is a good value if visiting Balian Beach. The location is a bit removed from most of the action, but only 5-10 minute walk to most anything in the area. The property is quite pretty, with lots of greenery, a lovely pool, and a great second floor to relax. However, the main sleeping area was a bit musty and dark.

Also, note that they are constructing a new villa right next door, and there's people visible most of the time (workers sleep in the construction site, etc).

Beautifully rustic tree top villa surrounded by lush tropical gardens. We loved the pool and outdoor hut to relax, especially in the evening with the pool and garden lighting creating a magical ambience. Great location with the restaurants, beach and yoga just a short walk away. Will come vist again.

The treehouse was our little oasis. We relaxed a lot on our terrace sourrounded by green lush nature. Made was a great host and Gusti a responsible driver. Balian Beach is a little surf and hippie/hipster place with a good vibe. Surf lessons and yoga can be found at the beach, nice restaurants as well. Our favourite was Tekor Café just 3 min walk away. At the treehouse we had a nice massage, just ask Made, he'll arrange it for you!
If you are looking for a time out to recharge your batteries, don't mind little crawlers in the trees, and want to stay in a very special place admits the green nature close to the beach, this is the place to go. I would come back!!

WOW!!!! The Tree house was AMAZING! The pool area is so beautifully landscaped and the Tree house is comfy! There is a night market at the top of the road for local food and a few great beach restaurants within walking distance. Perfect place to relax and rejuvenate!  We have to also mention that Made was the highlight of our stay! He was so kind and accomodating and we know we have made a lifelong friend! He was always there to hook us up with anything we needed and even made a special gift for my husbands birthday. Made & Myriam we appreciate you both. Mahalo Nui Loa from your Maui family!!

One word: amazing. Usually the pictures online look better, but the treehouse looked exactly like the pictures. If you had any questions Made was available to help and was also very kind. For example arranging transport, or helping out to book surfing lessons.  Would definitely recommend this!!

Made was the best host and welcomed us and made us feel comfortable from the very beginning of our stay. The garden is magical and one of a kind. Made took down coconuts for us to drink and we found other tropical fruits around the garden.
Our dog loved to go exploring in and around the garden.

The only negative to say is: There is a construction of a new bungalow just beside the house which make the experience less beautiful and more noisy. I would have loved this to be mentioned more specific and a discount in the construction period would have been in place.

We had a great time in Balian Beach. It is so secluded and cute compared to the rest of Bali. This treehouse had great wifi and a great upstairs room to hang out in. Like most of Bali these days there is construction next door. The funky house is very close next door in the shared yard so there is less privacy than expected. Bathroom is a little dingy. I think this place may be a little overpriced because of the publicity, but it is still great and we loved our stay.

Overall we had an enjoyable stay at the Balian treehouse.

Beginning with the positives, communication with Made and the owners was excellent both before and throughout the trip. All questions were quickly answered and their advice was very helpful. The owners also put us in contact with Gusti who drove us around several times during our stay. We were able to make plans and keep in contact with him using Whatsapp which was incredibly helpful. Additionally, the house and property are quite beautiful and are pictured accurately in the listing. The house is just a five minute walk from the beach and we really enjoyed the sleepy, yet tourist friendly town of Balian.

That said, we did experience several issues. During our stay our toilet started leaking and was unusable for several hours (however Made fixed it that day). Additionally, we never had hot water in our shower for the entire trip. I should also note that we rented both houses on the property which we shared with family members. For us, the layout was ideal; but for other travelers the two houses are quite close and I could see lack of privacy being a potential issue. Finally, all travelers should be aware the owners are building another villa next to this one (not noted in listing). During two days of our stay about six men were working on this house during the day, starting at 8 am. We found this frustrating as the construction is not picture or mentioned in the listing and this really diminished the private, serene atmosphere we expected. I highly recommend all travelers check on the status of this construction before booking.

Overall, we did enjoy our time here and the hosts were both friendly and helpful but travelers may want to check on the issues I mentioned.
I would recommened this to everyone! IT was amazing

We had a lovely stay in a really relaxing and picturesque environment. A bit far from other main touristy destinations and a tad expensive to get to but in the end totally worth it. Great for yoga and nature lovers. We met Made and Mario and they were both really friendly and welcoming. Definitely recommend. Hope we will get the chance to come back!

The tree house is the most relaxing and laid back place I've visited ever! The space itself is comfortable and modest with everything you need, plus there is the incredible scenery and the friendly and always helpful Made. He was there anytime I had questions but gave plenty of space for comfort. Also, Gusti was available and willing to drive to any tours or to and from the airport. He has so much information and facts about the island and its culture it makes the drive very enjoyable. The house is only a few minutes walk to balian beach where you can surf(they have boards available to rent) or enjoy beautiful views and there are plenty of excellent restaurants along the way to choose any meal. I will recommend the tree house to anyone considering traveling to Bali who is interested in being away from the hustle and bustle of the city. Thank again for the incredible stay, I hope next time is longer!

A place to hang out, have a swim in the pool, enjoy the georgous scenery, have a hort walk to the bech and eat at the tasty restaurant TekorBali which is in a 4 min walking distance.

Made was welcoming us warmly, showing us around and organzing us a driver for a trip to Tana Lot. There were a few Geckos in the room which ran away quickly when we approached them, so no cons :)
This place has no faults, it's like a magical world. The villa is in a perfect location to the surfer beach and close to loads of cool restaurants, definitely stay here. We will surely be back!
This place is amazing!!! Just like on the pictures and Made is a great host. We will dream about this place and want to come back again!

Stayed here for 5 days and it really is a little slice of heaven!! Loved staying here. The pool and garden are fabulous with loads of places to chill out.
It is a short walk to the restaurants and beach in Balian and not far to shop and ATM. This place is really only if you surf or want to really chill out away from it all which we did.
I can not recommend this place enough and made really made our stay enjoyable :)

This villa is a little piece of paradise. A tad far if you're looking to explore the more popular destinations in Bali but perfect for a few days of quiet relaxation. There is a great driver available if you're looking to go to other areas of Bali during your stay. The restaurants nearby are fantastic and at great prices. Pool is amazing for a hot day and the upstairs of the villa has stunning views and lots of comfortable space to lounge and relax. Made can also arrange massages at the villa which we HIGHLY recommend.

The place was great, and Made was a great Host. Though the listing was not quite what we thought it was going to be: It was a lot more secluded than we thought, and the interiors were not as nice as they looked in the photos. But the pool and garden were lovely.
If you would like a super quiet, secluded place and you're into surfing, this is the place for you.

This is a charming place! Quiet and peaceful, far from touristic paths. Small but very cozy houses (we rented both) are kept clean every day. Made was very helpful in everything and Gusti (the driver) took us to all the places around Bali. Perfect place for rest!
Highly recommended!

Great place to relax and chill out. Beautiful garden and tranquil.
Access is a little rustic and off the beaten track but well worth the effort.
Perfect stay. Made is a fantastic guy. He even took us to a beautiful local ceremony. This was an amazing experience.

Fantastic little getaway from the hustle of Seminyak and Kuta. One of the most unique accomodations in the world. Would highly recommend this to anyone! The owners, Miryam and Mario and the house keeper, Made, are all great people and very friendly and kind.

Just literally landed back in France after a 2 week stay at the treehouse and glasshouse.. It's everything and more you could ever ask for. From being met at the airport by Gusti who then acted as our chauffeur for the two weeks to being met by Made at the treehouse why we we arrived everything was seamless and perfect. We wanted a relaxing stay and that's certainly what we had. Managed 3 nights in Ubud during our stay which was great to visit buy it was lovely to get back 'home' to our paradise villa and the peace and quiet. Thank you Myriam, Made and Gusti for making our stay a memorable one. I'll certainly be passing on your details to any of our friends who show a interest in visiting Bali. Look forward to our second visit sometime.

This is such a magical place. The garden is so beautiful and well looked after. We loved swimming and lazing in the very comfortable pool chairs.  The view from upstairs was gorgeous looking out to palm trees. We loved sitting on the verhandah  listening to the heavy summer rain.

This place is awesome!!!! Made is phenomenal! He made sure we had everything we needed. We rented scooters and he had one delivered to the house, he ordered a massage for us as well as even climbed a tree and  got us a coconut. Everything was within walking distance! The food at the local restaurants was great! This place was super quiet and relaxing, definitely a surf village. I will for sure stay here when I come back to Bali. It was an amazing experience!

We had a great week in the tree house. It is all even prettier than the pictures. All facilities are present, especially the beautiful garden with pool and super comfy bed were standing out. Made takes care of the place and helped us with arranging massages at the house, renting scooters etc. The location is close to the beach, you can see it from the veranda. It's nice and quiet, gecko and bird noises all around. Balian beach is a very nice surfing villager, no touristic things around, the way we like it. I would recommend it to anyone!
And what a paradise it is! We had a perfect relaxing stay. Made is a great guy and always there to help. Ask for the massage!

This place was absolutely amazing. The location is very quiet but so beautiful and relaxing! There were quite a few restaurants and bars to check out (although we went to Tekor Bali everyday which I definitely recommend). The place looks exactly like the pictures, and Made cut down coconuts everyday for us to enjoy by the pool. Couldn't recommend this place enough, if you're going to Bali, you should definitely put this place on your list. Even if to stay for a few nights then head to somewhere busier like Seminyak (which is what we did).

We were met at the airport by Gusti who enthusiastically told us about the places we passed and provided us with helpful information. We were then met by Made who was gentle and kind and available throughout our stay and always asked us if there was anything we needed.

You've heard of paradise - well this is it!   We were met at the airport by the Treehouse's driver, and brought to the most peaceful, relaxing, private, clean retreat you could imagine.  Made, with his awesome smile, met us and made us feel instantly at home.  He not only completely tended to all our needs, but the beautiful grounds as well - he's a keeper!  Just a 3 min. walk to the ocean side - great surfing,  and also to tasty and friendly cafes.  We had couple massages (thank you sooooo much) right at the treehouse.  Could not have asked for anything more.  Perfect place to chill out.  Loved all the artistic details in the treehouse and around the grounds.

The pictures although amazing do not do this little slice of heaven justice. It's truly beautiful.

Made was amazing, from arranging a driver for us to climbing the coconut tree to get us fresh coconuts to drink from.

The area is so peaceful and beautiful, eating out is reasonably priced we loved the Tekor Bali (which is the nearest)
We ended up there for breakfast and dinner on more than one occasion.
If you pop in say hi from Andrew and Laura (they are so friendly).

If you hire a Scooter, be warned getting it up the stone pathway is slightly hazardous, properly best to leave it at the bottom (lesson learnt).

I can't recommend this place enough, we ended up cancelling a couple of day trips we had planned to we could just enjoy this little slice of heaven.

We had an absolutely wonderful couple of nights staying here, it's both close to Balian beach yet feels secluded and peaceful for relaxing by the pool in the evening. We hope to return again sometime!
The place in beautiful and super cute. It's charming, artistic and above all genuine. Loved it!

We LOVE this home!! So close to the beach and restaurants but you'll want to spend as much time enjoying the treehouse as possible! Made was so helpful during our arrival and stay and even arranged a scooter for us and cut us down coconuts to drink from the backyard! He and his wife clean the house spotless everyday and his English is fantastic even though  he just started learning. 3 nights were not enough, we will hopefully be back again soon! Bring bug spray!!!

Wow wow and again wow! Balian Treehouse is such a magical place. It was like stepping into my own dream! Made is a great host who is willing to help you with everything. The garden is really beautiful  and very well maintained. He even let us take a coconut from te garden by ourselfs which was really fun! The treehouse itself is also amazing. You can see that it is build with lots of love. They have an eye for the smallest details. anyone who doubts to go here, do not hesitate just go! this place will remain forever in your mind. Myriam, Made and Gusti, thank you very much for everything!
Fantastic place and a great experiance. If you are looking to get away from the hassle bassel of bali and be at a paradise try this place. Thank you Made i will see you again

Wow! Our stay at the balian tree house was simply wonderful. The house and the garden with pool are very beautiful. Made,  the manager and gardener came everyday to clean the whole property. He even climed on a palmtree and picked a coconut for us to serve it right at the pool. Like heaven. He was very friendly and helpful and so were the owners as well. We very much recommend to visit this place which was just like paradise for us. Balian is also a quite and unique place.
