Beautiful place, lovely people, Made and Myriam. We didn't want to leave but unfortunately new guest were arriving. Thank you very much and till next time!!

We loved our stay at Balian Tree house! It's even more beautiful than the photos, so serene and relaxing. It's a short walk to wonderful restaurants. Made and Gusti (who drove us from the airport) were so kind and welcoming, and willing to help with any small request. We loved our time here and would absolutely return!

What can we say! What an amazing holiday it was such a pleasure to spend 9 nights at this beautiful tree house. We were greeted at the airport by Gusti who was extremely knowledgable about Bali and was happy to take us out later in our holiday to Sangeh Monkey Temple, Tepenungen waterfall and Canguu beach. We arrived at night and woke up to the most beautiful peaceful and private garden. It is only a short walk to the beautiful surfers beach for breakfast / dinner and you can even use the phone in the treehouse to order takeaway!
We were made to feel so welcome by Made who looks after the garden and the treehouse as well as his family who came to celebrate my birthday with us! We were genuinely taken back by the hospitality of the Balian people! Made couldn't have been more helpful and such fun! We loved having fresh cocunut from a tree in the garden most days!
Finally, we had a dog called Molly who stayed us for the duration of our stay sleeping outside the treehouse and walking with us down the beach every morning for breakfast!!
We would highly recommend the treehouse to anyone who wants a peaceful and private holiday or someone who just wants something different. We will definitely try to make our way back for a visit in the future! Overall, the holiday of a life time!!!

Made was a super nice host. Even though we arrived at 11 pm, he was so kind to come pick us up from the road.

The house was exceptionally beautiful and everywhere was tastefully designed and decorated with handcrafted woodwork.

The pool was amazing! The pictures are accurate, but when you're in it, it's got a more wonderful feel to it.

Everywhere was clean. Definitely recommended!

Thanks Made!

Made was an absolutely fantastic host and we had a lovely time during our stay. Beach and several restaurants are walking distance from the villa. Beautiful pool and upstairs balcony area as well. We were able to take yoga classes at a nearby resort by the beach too. Made was so kind and humble. He cleaned our room everyday and was available anytime that we needed him. He even climbed a tree to get us coconuts while we were in the pool! He arranged transportation from the airport and to our next location on Bali too. We truly loved our stay here.

We loved our stay at Balian Treehouse -
We had the pleasure of meeting not just Made the wonderful manager, but also the lovely owners Miriam and Mario.
All of them were extremely accommodating, helped us with our transfers to and from (our driver, Gusti, was also great!) and arranged the best massage we have EVER had - no exaggeration.
Aside from the great people the place was as great (if note greater) as you see in the photos. Miriam gave us the full story of what they'd built if from etc. and they've done such a lovely job with the place.
Very authentic-feeling but really comfortable and in beautifully relaxing surrounds. We loved it and really hope to go back.

If you are worried that the perfect pictures of the Balian Tree House are an oversell, don’t be.  No pictures can do the beauty justice. The homestay was double the price of what my boyfriend and I usually pay in Bali, but several times as enjoyable. Made, the manager is helpful and a pleasure to speak with. We were able to check out the new Glass House as well (you can find this posting on Made’s AirBnB page). It’s similar to the Tree House, but the best place to relax and lounge is downstairs instead of upstairs. The Glass House’s kitchen is outdoors which gives it more of a bar feel than the Tree House. I would highly recommend either place.

We had an incredible time at Made's place. It is soooo beautiful- even better than the pictures! It reminded us of Alice in Wonderland! It was peaceful and quiet, and Made went out of his way to make us feel right at home straight away. He even climbed a coconut tree for us to have coconuts! He also brought us bananas from his family's tree. These little additions made it very special. It is really close to Balian beach, we could walk every day. And the A/C at night made it heavenly to sleep in. We decided to stay an extra night in the new "glass house", which we found even cooler! Thank you so much- we are already planning when our next visit will be!

Made was communicative, kind, and welcoming. His treehouse is beautiful and the perfect retreat for someone looking for alone time or a couple looking to spend quality time together. As a solo traveler, I appreciated that Made came to work on the gardens every day and helped check-in on me. He also arranged transport to bring me to and from the Treehouse from my other accommodations with a very friendly driver, Gusti.

While the Treehouse doesn't come with breakfast, the kitchen is well stocked - I had fun making my own version of gado-gado!

Very highly recommend Made and his Treehouse!
The accommodation was in lovey condition and my wife and I found it the perfect place for a relaxing beach holiday. The massages were great and a relatively cheap price. Highly recommended.

We found this villa as it was advertised as one of the "top 10 most desirable AirBnB listing". The expectation was high prior to walking into the villa. The exterior of the villa is true to the listing, charming, cute hut sitting on top of the hill. The room itself felt a bit small and can do with a table/chair for sitting inside at night.

The upstairs area is open and non-air conditioned, whilst we didn't use it at night due to mosquitos it is a great look out platform during the day. You can always take the fan from down stairs to up stairs on a hot day.

A bit of a draw back is the bathroom/toilet area. Looking back to the listing we've realized that there isn't really a shot of the shower and toilet in the villa and it might have something to do with it is not the most appealing part of the equation - The bathroom area lives in the staircase area of the villa, being an enclosed area with small windows covered by greens it felt a bit damp and could do with better ventilation (Made will be cutting back the green). Whilst we were there we also found that the toilet is a bit crocked and leaking slightly (Myriam suggested that she will be replacing the toilet).

The track to the beach/restaurants can get muddy when raining as the area's road isn't really built up but with all the developments that is going on in the area I suspect the roads will be upgraded down the track. The restaurants were great at Balian Beach and we enjoyed breakfast/lunch/dinner there.

Whilst we only stayed 2 of the 3 nights booked, through communication I can feel that the Balian Tree house is being managed by a team that cares. Myriam was quick to respond to my concerns and explained to me things they are doing/will do to address the points, I trust the villa with grow as it receives more and more positive criticism. Made is friendly and is on site from morning until around 4pm. We didn't really need his help with anything and he just worked quietly on the villa next door when we were there.

All and all I think it is a great little place to enjoy the nature and sit by the pool during the day. The night life at the near by hotels/restaurants felt lively. If you are not a night thrill seeking person it can feel a bit trapped at night in the room. like everything it is probably a place for everyone but I can definitely see the charms that this little villa brings.

To be honest, it was quite a shock arriving late at night in the dark at the treehouse. We just enjoyed a couple of days in a luxury hotel in Singapore and were not yet prepared for all the overwhelming "nature". But that quickly changed. Friendly Gusti picked us up from the airport and showed us around the house. In the garden we were greeted by a couple of frogs, some snails and a few gecko's. They were soon to become our pets. After a good night's rest we met Made who immediately climbed a tree to get us some fresh coconuts. Many more fruits followed throughout the week. There were two small issues upon arrival and first day, but they were resolved within the hour and Myriam made sure we could relax to the max. We mostly ate at the lovely restaurants in the village or at the night market and I enjoyed a flat white from the coffee stand almost every morning. The food was very enjoyable everywhere and the people are very friendly. Also, the food is not expensive at all, causing me to eat and drink way too much. We often ended the day on the top floor looking over the garden, amazing. The tropical sounds are also a guarantee for a great night's sleep. I really found this the ideal spot to enjoy a nice holiday and find rest. Of all my vacations this is the one were I feel I returned in the most relaxed state possible.
A stunningly beautiful location. Made and his wife were very welcoming and attentive throughout our stay. Balian is a friendly little community. We certainly recommend Treehouse.

The mushroom villa is an amazing place to stay! Its like being on retreat! Your own luscious hideaway with gorgeous views just a few minutes walk from the beach.
Balian is such a peaceful little area, the surf is great and the food is wonderful. Really ticks all the holiday boxes.
If you are looking for a relaxing getaway far from the touristy hustle and bustle of Bali's main towns then this is what you are looking for! the villa itself has everything you need; from AC, pool, stove, fridge, DVD player to a lovely upstairs daybed where you can watch the sunrise. The caretaker, Made and his wife are such lovely people and will help you with any request, right down to collecting and cracking open a fresh coconut for you to drink!
Unfortunately I got sick at the end of our stay, however both Made and the owner Mario were so helpful and caring, making all sorts of generous offers to assist me and my boyfriend. They really went above and beyond and I cant recommend this place enough! We loved it and will definitely be back!

The house and grounds are amazing. Made is very sweet. The area is great.

Communication was extremely difficult. It was very unclear who we were speaking with before our arrival. Miryam is the owner but she messages as if she is Made. When we arrived there was no explanation on the house, neighborhood or grounds. Made (the gardener) is wonderful but does not speak English so the questions we had could not be answered. The power went out a few times every day (we followed others' advice to not use the shower and ac at the same time). There was construction every day next door and in front of the house. There is a house manual (one page) that is out of date. The information is incorrect, phone numbers are wrong. Given that there are some quirks to the house, it would have been helpful if at least the manual was updated.

This could have been an incredible experience, however we were completely in the dark. It felt like, with the popularity of this airbnb, the owners have given up trying to make the guests feel comfortable. Hopefully this was just a fluke and the owners will give more attention to others in the future. Mario (Miryam's boyfriend) stopped by as we were leaving for the airport . He was on his way to go surfing. It would have been nice to hear from him or see him a few days earlier. We tried to contact him but the phone number we were given was incorrect.

We definitely recommend this place to others if communication is improved.
Amazing House and perfect host :)
The place was absolutely stunning, it was like staying in paradise for a couple of days. Would really recommend!

We enjoyed our stay. Balinese Beach is a an excellent place to just kick back, relax and get off the grid. It's a surfers town, so the vibe is relaxed and the local people are just outstanding. Very welcoming and kind.

Made was great, setting us up with an excellent masseuse for a massage on the top veranda and cutting fresh coconuts for us from the trees on the property.

Gusti, who works with the host, picked us up at our hotel in Ubud and was fantastic.
The house works great for two people and the pool is an incredible treat on a hot day.

It rained the night before we arrived, and the dirt roads leading to the treehouse were muddy and impassable by car, so we and Gusti trekked our bags to the house.

We arrived to find Made waiting for us and he a gave us a quick tour of the home. Made and two other men were working on an addition next door, so they were close by if we needed him.

There is a book inside which has notes from the host and tips on how on the house works and how to locate the power box.

I didn't read the part about how the power may shut off if you have the AC and shower on at the same time as the pool motor is running. The power cut out when I was in the shower but it was quickly fixed when I went behind the house to flip the switch back on.

When we were there, there were two small construction projects going on simultaneously, one in an adjacent lot and the one next to the house, but they weren't loud enough to interfere with our stay. The host left a note saying the price was reduced due to the ongoing work.

Our favorite place in the home was the top veranda, which has an outdoor speaker and a disc of CD's, we spent the first night listening to classical music as the sun set.

There is also the great quality of surrounding restaurants, and the one closest to the home, next to the coffee stand, was excellent.

Be sure to bring your mosquito spray and good shoes for walking through the dirt paths and get ready to relax!

My stay at Bali beachhouse was excellent. Madi and his wife were very helpful with any questions. Great place only 5 minutes from the beach to surf and chill. The place itself is very Nice with a clean swimming pool, would recommend, thanks again!

Thanks a lot for having us on your wonderfull
Place. I think for us it was the best Solution
to arrive on your Place in Bali. You gave us
the Time to come down and getting the first
feeling for Bali. The Staff was verry frendly and helpful.
I hope we see us again one day.
We had a just Perfect stay in this beautiful and peaceful place! Totally relaxing with great service from Gusti, Made and his wife and of course Myriam. Thank you for the special time we had here!

The Most wonderful Place to live! Clean, Cosy, Quiet, just lovely. Made (The gardener) and his wife - who Cares for the House - are absolutely adorable. Myriam (the owner) also helped us whenever we had a question. I can t say anything else than: perfect!
Best place in Balian Beach!
Great place to stay! Beautiful house. Only downside was an uninvited guest (one big gecko) but we kicked him out pretty quickly!

Gusti picked us up at the airport (1am) and drives us to the mushroom villa! The villa and the garden are super nice as the pictures show! If you are a surfer Balian beach (5 minutes walking) can offer you nice waves. If you are not you can enjoy the restaurants on the beach with good local and western food. Putu during my stay was sick so I had to do some small cleaning but was not a problem. I really suggest this place to who wants to relax and enjoy the nature. Miryam was really supportive and Gusti drived us during all our stay in Bali (Ubud and Pecatu) with a fair price package. Thank you!

We arrived to this Eco-touristic treehouse as our final of four villas during our two week honeymoon around Bali. It truly is a marvelous and cute little house with a spectacular upstairs that is relaxing and wild at the same time. The ocean is visible from the second floor that overlooks the beautiful yard.
Putu greeted us wonderfully when we arrived and explained everything clearly. The surrounding area is currently getting developed which did mean that it was easy to walk to several different options for restaurants. We were not surfers so we did happen to rent a scooter (organized for us by Putu at a very reasonable price!) in order to go down to Echo Beach farther East however there is a beach not too far off from the villa.
It was a beautiful last three nights at this simple villa that truly communicates the wild nature of Bali. I would recommend this for any adventurous couple that loves to live in isolation and in the heart of more rural Bali away from the craziness of Kuta.

My partner Simon and i stayed at the Balian Tree House for 5 days and the photos and description exceeded our already high expectations. The spacious tree house is nestled in between to farms in a quiet area in Balian only 5-10 mins from Balian Beach. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and was warmly welcomed by the lovely Putu who was very helpful and a genuinely nice person. This was the first stop on our first ever trip to Bali and the bar was set incredibly high. Thank you for allowing us to experience Balian in your gorgeous property it was truly memorable!

We had a wonderful stay in the mushroom villa. The villa and the garden with the pool are amazing. It's exactly as nice as on the pictures. We spent a lot of the time at the pool and walking on the beach. There are really nice restaurants around with very friendly staff but most of the time we ate at pondok pitaya. After a day in crowdy Kuta it was like coming home to the nice balian with the great nature.

Putu the houskeeper is very friendly and helped us whenever needed. She arranged us a driver and massages.
She comes everyday to clean the house but is also reachable by phone.

It was the best place we could imagine to spend 2 weeks full of relaxing, expiriencing new things and good food. I can recommend it to everyone who want to feel like in paradise.
The tree house or mushroom villa was serene.  Clean but full of nature.  Thanks for having us!  Thanks also for suggesting Gusti, he was an excellent driver.

The mushroom villa is a wonderfull place for relaxation. the garden is really beutiful and there are coconut, papaya and some kind of maracuja you can eat direktly from it. also there are many possibilitys to lay down in the sun or shadow and just enjoy the day. the pool is really awesome and looks amazing especially in the nighttime. the house is very nice aswell. only the kitchen is a bit small, but its better to get food in the nice restaurants or one of the plenty warungs anyways. we totally enjoyed our time and would recommend this plays to everyone who want to take some quiet time in paradise.

The house is magical! Everything was clean and identical to the photos. Miryam herself was easy to contact and so helpful when we did! She arranged for Gusti, a local cab driver, to pick us from the airport. He gave us a lot of great advice about the area and even took us around the city one day! The restaurants are within walking distance and all have really helpful, friendly staff. I would definitely stay here again and highly recommend it for anyone in the area :)

Our experience at the Balian Treehouse was wonderful! Exactly as shown in the pictures. Putu was so incredibly friendly and accommodating. She was able to set us up with a motorbike as well as a poolside couples massage on the property. I think it should be noted that Putu is not the owner, nor the person who you are communicating with through AirBnB. That was a bit confusing for me at first. Miryam is the owner who you will likely not meet since she does not live in Balian Beach.
The view from the balcony is breathtaking, and the perfect way to start your morning as you sip on coffee and eat the breakfast that you cooked in the kitchen downstairs. The kitchen comes with all the basic necessities which is a really nice thing to have a home-cooked meal while traveling.
There were definitely geckos living in the treehouse who we thought of as our Balian pets, along with Molly the dog who would come on to the property and sleep in the poolside bungalow at night.
The night market is a must, and walking distance from the treehouse. You can get a great, authentic meal for so cheap! I ate at the noodle soup stand which came out to only 79 cents USD!!
As for the rest..of course, the beach is beautiful, Tom's Garden cafe has a GREAT squid satay, and the Pondok Pitaya has a wonderful setup for a daily yoga class with an ocean view.
The treehouse was one of our favorite memories of Bali & I would recommend this place to any of my friends. Thank you to Putu and Miryam!!

Although I did not meet the owner Myriam, Putu the tarecaker was sensationally helpful and friendly and did her utmost to pamper me and make my stay a wonderful pleasant one.
The mushroom house is just as described: a perfect relaxing getaway. The approximity to the beach and also having a pool for yourself is a beautiful luxury.

I wold definitely recommend this site and will be coming back!

Putu was a fantastic host and the treehouse is paradise! Super friendly, and made sure we had everything we needed. She is close by too, and quick to resolve any issues that may arrive. She helped coordinate massages for us with Elou- in our three weeks of travel in Thailand and Bali, hands down the best massage! So we had her come back again :) Wayan is great too if you want to do a little tour or day trip- we went to Ubud.

We spent four peaceful days at the Balian Treehouse. Everything was just as beautiful if not more than what is pictured. The neighborhood was filled with locals, with an area near the beach geared toward travelers (mostly surfers). You really feel like you're getting an authentic experience without missing things you are used to. Walk 5 minutes and you're at the black sand beach, where there are plenty of happening places to eat- lots of healthy options too! The area seems to be developing (people realized what a gem Balian is) so I recommend going now!

This is paradise! I cried when we had to leave this house and it's beautiful view and grounds, the village and most importantly the people that made our stay so memorable. Putu is a fabulous host. She included us in a temple ceremony that we longed to see. It was so special to be apart of the village and to hear the traditional Balinese music. The area is serene, quite and quaint. There are very few places to eat and drink but they all have something special about them. The pool is fantastic and the tree house is everything you would expect for a simple life. We were able to explore many of the beaches with help from our friend Solti, a sweet puppy who adopted us for our stay.
The sunsets were breath taking.
Make sure you have a daily massage with Elou. She came to the house and made each morning a treat.
Also Ilou, is quite a fantastic hostess at the restaurant Mai Malu. She always remembered our name and greeted us with friendship and love.
We will never forget our stay at the mushroom villa and we are determined to visit again. We hope you enjoy it as much as we did.

We had a wonderful, peacefull time at the mushroom villa. Everything was perfect, we missed nothing! The House is so nice and beautiful. Decorated from the heart. The pool is amazing and the whole area flashed us away! It was nothing to be faulted!!! Putu helped us when we needed a motorbike or a car, she is very friendly and diligently!
We met Mario once, he was a very friendly, kindhearted and responsive person. The village is small, but we got everything what we needed in the small supermarket. There are a few nice small restaurants . The house is situated in a surfers paradise, the beachview from dekis warung is amazing. We wont to thank for everything, for hosting us friendly. Your house is a treasure!!!
Marcus+Guri

Back home again we still have this wonderfull place in our mind and feeling. We spent a purely relaxing week in Balian, preparing a nice breakfast every morning, swimming and plashing in the pool, having two great massages, reading at the balcony and watching what's going on in the surrounding. You don't have to be a surfer to love this place (we confess we had never been in the sea during our stay). It is perfect. Thanks Putu for your care.

Yes, go there!!!
This place is wonderfull,
the house, the pool, the beach!
We had a great time there,
i can defenitly recomend the Mushroom Villa.
Thank you Miryam, Mario and Putu for your warm wellcome!
We like to come back again one day...

I have to say how impressed I was with the the host Miryam, the house and its location, and the help from Putu during our stay. Both Miryam and Putu went out of their way to ensure we had the best stay possible - always available to help and taking care of things like scooter hire and providing excellent recommendations for local restaurants and activities. The house itself is a gem - we wish it was ours. The location is perfect, quiet and just a short 5 min walk to the beach and restaurants. Thank you for allowing us into your paradise! If you stay you wont be disappointed!

It was absolutely amazing! Even better than the pictures. The view over the palm trees an the ocean, the garden with the pool, the upper dek and six different places to relax. Balian beach itself is also very nice. We ate out every day at the beach at Pondok Pitaya or Toms cafe.
Would definitely recommend it if you just want to relax in a small village.

Traveling to another country can be unpredictable...Miryam took the guess work out of it. Showing up to the airport with Gusti (the driver) holding a sign with our names on it was the start to a wonderful stay. His knowledge of the island and its history was very helpful and welcoming as we had asked him many questions as we made our way to the Villa.

Balian Beach (and Bali in general) boasted the happiest of people, great traditional food options (with Western options available) very good prices, plenty of beaches, sunsets and great energy.

As for Miryam's place...we couldn't have asked for anything better. Off the beaten path, yet close to everything. The staff was able to help as needed. It was very comfortable. With the wonderful pool, options for napping (6 in all just on her property), close proximity to the beach and a number of eating establishments and local markets...our recurring question was, "What do we do next; relax, swim or eat?"

To add to the excitement and experience, we were given the opportunity to attend a traditional Hindu celebration of a neighbor!

Don't forget to explore the area bit... a well hidden trail along the river from the beach to the main road was fun and a remote swimming spot on the beach to the south and west accessible by stairway boasted a large carved fish in the stone cliffs that surrounded it and gave us an option for swimming and sunbathing with no one else around! A massage at the tip of a cliff at Gajah Mina is another must.

All in all, the energy was inviting, warm and very positive. Arrive with high expectations and prepare to be utterly satisfied. Arrive with no expectations, and prepare to be swept away!

Miryam, Mario and Putu and the Mushroom Villa TreeHouse are pure magic. Our hearts and souls feel pure and full after immersing ourselves onto this land, their home and the lovely village of Balian Beach. Every single thing lived up to Miryam's perfect description of their home built with nothing but love, the land is nothing short of exquisite (Mother Nature has truly blessed this land!) and every single person in the village was magic incarnated, kind, loving, and truly left a huge impression on our hearts and souls. There is nothing we do not love about vacationing here (actually living here for 10 days)... especially the sacred Bali dogs, the magic of the Moon, the perfect waves my man got to surf (only a 3 minute stroll away, including sweet + smiling mama and baby cows, awww!) and the authentic generosity and blessings bestowed upon us by our hosts and villagers that we are happy and proud to now call our FRIENDS. Our hearts are full with abundance, clarity, and peace. The Balian TreeHouse (and oh that magical oasis pool- best pool I've ever swam, floated, did handstands, meditated in- in my entire life, for reals!) truly helped us to "reset and renew" our spirits and souls. And the beach itself was just as healing (perfect for yoga and truly "finding yourself" in the sacred coves, wow) We cannot imagine spending our vacation in Bali anywhere else, ever again. Truth. Our love and light has been lit again by the warmth and love of Bali- Miryam, Mario, Putu and the beautiful community of Balian Beach. Anyone that chooses to stay here will leave with a softer heart, bigger smile, and happy soul. Eternal gratitude for this gorgeous and surreal experience M+M. We love you. The Mushroom Villa is a sacred healing spot to get you back in tune with the Cosmic Order in this life. All Love, (see you sooner than later!) Terimah Kasih, forever Bali. We are still feeling it! XXXXXXXX MUA

It is a little hard to find, but once you find it it is a little slice of heaven! Situated on a hill with nice views of the surroundings. Balean beach is only a short walk away and when you get there you'll find an amazing surfspot surrounded by laid back restaurants and beach bars. The house itself is small and cozy, but you'll spend most time chilling on the porch or in the amazing pool. The house gecko is very friendly and keeps the insects at bay.
Putu is an excellent guid and he can arrange some of the best massages you can find on Bali.

We had great experience at Miryam's villa. The location is very quiet, far from crowded places, at the same time with few nice restaurants along the seaside. The set-up is amazing-authentic villa with a pool and terrace, with a feel of complete privacy. The host is very helpful and smooth in communication. Highly recommended for a few-day relaxation or surfing.

Wow where do I start to describe our experience. From the moment Gusti picked us up in the taxi until the moment we left it was perfect. The house is amazing, it has everything you need for a relaxing holiday and is situated in a perfect location. It takes about 3 minutes to walk to the beach but the house it is far enough away that you feel like you are in the middle of nowhere. And when we felt too lazy to go to the beach we just relaxed at the pool.

Putu went to so much effort to make us feel welcome and anything we needed he arranged straight away. He organised for us to have massages at the house, he arranged a scooter for us and took us on a day trip which turned out to be the highlight of our trip. He took us to a viewpoint where you can see rice fields for miles, very beautiful. Then he brought us to a monkey temple which looked like something out of Indiana Jones haha after the temple he brought us to a beautiful waterfall and on the way home we dropped into a temple that is a batcave, all in all a truly wonderful experience.

I highly recommend staying here. Miryam and Putu are the perfect hosts. We are definitely going to stay here again.

We stayed in the mushroom villa for 5 nights and enjoyed every moment of it. We were the first to rent the place after they had installed the pool and they were not 100% finished around the pool, but it didn't really matter. Balian is a great place, and we loved that the villa was a little bit secluded. Go there now, before more houses pop up!

Btw, you shouldn't mind some insects or a random cow or rooster stopping by the garden.

Putu, the housekeeper, was very nice and helpful!

Balian was a perfect retreat for us with its laid back atmosphere and relaxed pace. The quaint Balian treehouse by Miryam completed the experience. We fell in love with the mushroom villa when we reached the place in late afternoon. Such a lovely place! The first floor was the bedroom with a comfortable bed and a kitchenette which was handy to whip up a simple meal (we cooked instant noodles when we were too lazy to step out of the villa). We had the air con switched on at night when we shut all the windows to keep the bugs out (understand they are attracted to lights), which kept the room cool and nice to sleep in. The upper deck had a really high ceiling that gave it a liberating spacious feel. We particularly loved the comfy seaters out on the balcony where one of it could either seat two to three people comfortably or double up as a cozy bed. This, in fact, was our favourite spot where we would sit for hours from morning till evening, reading a book or surfing away on our tablets (yup, wifi is available in the villa), and at the same time soaking in what nature offered us.. sights of dogs, cows and chickens, and coconut trees that lined the landscape and set against the backdrop of the sea; sound of the animals and rustling of leaves; and the breeze that brushed our skin softly. When night fell, we would be down to watch the DVDs that were aplenty in the house. The villa is secluded but not isolated. It was an easy five to ten minutes walk to the beach where the restaurants and cafes were. Whilst we did not have the chance to meet Miryam in person, she made arrangement to welcome us with chilled coconuts on our day of arrival :) And her housekeeper, Putu (who doesn't stay in the house), was a call away from the handset that was made available in the villa; and he appeared in his motorbike within minutes when we need his assistance. This was our first trip to Bali. It was both a unique and memorable holiday for us, and our stay in this lovely villa contributed a big part in our memories of this trip.

We were in need of some serious relaxation, and boy was this the right place! It's located in a small village, which is just big enough to have a couple of tiny restaurants and some convenience stores, Miryam's house is located on a hillside and is a five minute walk from the beach and its shops. Being five minutes away makes the house even more secluded. You can spend evenings on the open-air upper deck, and hear nothing but chirps. Sometimes a cow passes by, or some chickens run around on the property. It gets really wild when Molly the dog protects the land by barking at these animals ;) The village inhabitants, human and non-human, seem to share a gene which makes them super of friendly and relaxed. Miryam is a superb host. Although she had other plans, she wanted to greet us, and decided to wait, despite our delayed arrival. Everything you need is in the house, ready for you to use. Putu always came through when we needed him.

Had a great stay in this funky mushroom villa!! Perfect location near the beach. Balian is a quiet area that really feels like "old" Bali and takes your breath away. Miryam was great about recommending restaurants and organising transport for us.

The apartment has has everything you need, however there is a lot of insects so bring some good insect repellant.

To spend some days in Miryam house was amazing! The "mushroom villa" is really a special and magical place, the house is really confortable with a great view from the balcony and you can feel the nature around you. We'll really miss it!!

This treehouse truly was amazing. I ended up booking last minute and Miryam was fast to respond and work things out so it was possible to book it for the dates I wanted. The house and property itself was just as beautiful as it looked in the pictures. We really liked the laid back atmosphere of Balian Beach, and overall loved our stay here!

Staying at the treehouse was quite a memorable & unique experience. It has a homey feeling plus the top balcony is a very good place to meditate or just while away your time.

Miryam gave us some welcome drinks which are 2 fresh and cold coconuts left in the fridge. The bed was quite big and she has a big collection of dvds for entertainment during the night.

The treehouse is near to the beach but there are only 3 restaurants within walking distance. The sunset at Balian beach is very stunning so do not forget to watch it as u have dinner or a beer at Pondok Pittaya.

Miryam including her caretaker Putu and the taxi driver Gusti ensured that we were picked up and sent to the airport at the right time.

Overall staying there was a wonderful experience, which a hotel cannot replicate.

What an absolutely beautiful place. I would recommend this place to anyone wanting to get away from the hassle of the bigger cities. Lovely beach, lovely cafes. such a beautiful location as well. the perfect place to relax and let the world go by.

Brilliant house, beautifully located among a lot of different trees and grass. There are some other houses nearby, but the only close neighbors we encountered were the mellow cows walking and eating the grass around the house.
If you are a surfer this is a great spot to surf (I guess since there were quite some in the sea), if you are not (like me and my girlfriend) this area is still a very nice area to simply hang out on the balcony, enjoy the calm nature and the sound of a wild sea.

The house has everything we could wish for, very large bed, airco, hot shower, balcony and multiple couches. You could cook, but there are plenty nice and cheap places to eat around and some deliver to your doorstep.

It was beautiful. Made is a helpful man who doesn't have to do much to make you happy with such a beautiful home built by him. But he is still always available and helps with everything you need. I would recommend this to anyone.
Beautiful home in a small but still uncrowded area of Bali. Much less touristy than the center and south of the island!
This is the best place in Bali !!
Good hosts ,clean and cozy house ,beautiful garden ,nearby there is everything you need, including the beach with the ocean

This place is fantastic! Me and my sister loved it. It is an oasis of peace and quiet. The garden is beautiful and very well maintained, the house is decorated with great personality and taste. The terrace at the top with sea and garden views is a delight. The area itself is very nice. Balian beach is a place protected from mass tourism and the living is good.  Tourists are mostly surfers, happy to be there. A perfect place to recharge your batteries. We will definitely be back. Thank you to Made and the owner of the place for being so kind and warm.

The Treehouse is worth a trip at any time. The tranquility there and the beautiful location is simply enchanting. We enjoyed the pool and the very nicely landscaped garden. We also enjoyed sitting on the upper terrace in the evening and wraping up the day.
Beautiful and great experience 100% recommended
Definitely worth a visit 👌

Overall, we enjoyed the Tree House, but we considered whether we would give 3 or 4 stars for a long time.
The garden is very nicely laid out and the house is also spacious and equipped with some details, but also outdated and partly in need of renovation. When we arrived, there was a musty, fashionable smell on the ground floor that made us think of the immediate departure. Only after 48 hours of continuous ventilation did the smell slowly improve. The ground floor is very dark, even with light, cycling was not easy. The sinks in the living room and bathroom were leaking and the water ran out below. The towels were never changed in 5 days. In the pool, some tiles are loose and should be reattached.
Unfortunately, the value for money is not right here.
Made is nice. We like the house.
A very nice well arranged and thoughtful villa. Very clean and well located, close to local restaurants, the market, and a 5-minute walk from the beach.

On the site, the property looked very luxurious, which is disappointing in practice. The location is nice but hard to find. Very nice restaurants in the neighborhood!

Made is great host. Helpful, very responsive and a cozy guy!

The location is very remote and difficult to find, and it's not easy to get a taxi ~
There is a lizard on the first floor of our stay and sleeps on the 2nd floor ~
The next day, I decided to change the hotel, and I can't refund the money ~
Friends in China, if you see the comments, don't go, it's really not so beautiful, it's better to stay in a hotel in Bali, don't stay in a homestay ~
Beautiful villa, amazing tropical garden with squirrels, birds, butterflies in everything! Made who takes care of the villas is excellent;)

I can recommend the bamboo house to anyone looking for a quiet place in Bali!!! It was great and the local restaurants (which are really only 3min away)are all great. If we knew that beforehand, we would definitely have stayed longer. A cleanly maintained property,at this place many in Made. And the best thing is if you don't feel like eating out, you cook something in the house. We were there for 2 nights and unfortunately had to continue to move forward!Thank you so much for this wonderful place.Terima kasih

Small paradise. We rented two houses at once and almost did not leave the villa.
There are great restaurants nearby, the sea is 5 minutes by walking.
Quiet secluded place.
Very nice and privileged space. Warm and available service from Made.
It was just beautiful!!! The house and garden are fantastic and Made and Miryam are super friendly and helpful wherever possible.. always happy to.. :-)
A very local and cultural retreat!Very quiet and peaceful, very good place to relax!

The photos don't promise too much, it's even better than the photos show. In the area there are 2 rooms/houses that are rented out and both are wonderfully located. In a beautiful garden with pool and also 2 small open houses to be easy. I can only recommend this accommodation. Anytime again, Made is a great host and takes care of his guests with affection, thanks again for everything

The Balian Treehouse is a super romantic home in a fairytale location. The garden is lovingly maintained by Made who is never disturbing. But if you want it, he will take care of everything for you. Motorbikes, massages or a taxi, no problem. And fresh papaya from the garden or a coconut every day. During the day it is wonderful in the pool, in the evening when the lights go on in the garden it becomes a fairytale! We spent the evenings on the balcony where there is a lovely lounge sofa. With a cold Bintang from the fridge.... What a rest! The house may not be the most luxurious thing there is, but it is clean and very cozy with a lovely bed. For us perfect.
Balian is a super relaxed place, no mass tourism, fine restaurants and a night market with eateries where you can eat money for all kinds of people. So if you really want something special, go to Balian Treehouse. Thank you very much for the hospitality, Myriam and Made!
Made made our stay extra fun! We had a drink from the local alcohol Arak together and sat by the pool. Furthermore, very helpful!

The perfect location!

The Mushroom Villa is located a bit outside of the small surf spot downstairs on the beach (about 5 min. walk). The really fantastic garden and the great pool invite you to relax. From pick up at the airport to departure, everything really worked out great. Made is the house manager and took really perfect care of us and our concerns, thanks again for everything! Miryam is the owner and was always super reachable by mail or phone. If we come to Bali again, definitely go to the Treehouse!

I liked everything! Very calm and secluded stay. For surfers, this is a perfect location. There are not so many cafes but they cook delicious and inexpensive especially in Tecor! The pool is gorgeous especially in the tropical rain. Thank you!

Our stay at the "Mushroom villa" was a dream to be in. Quiet, idyllic, a lovingly furnished house with breathtaking views from the upper floor! The pool provides a pleasant refreshment in the sunshine. The restaurants and supermarket are a 5-minute walk away. Miryam, Mario and Putu supported us at any time with helpful tips and were very warm, loving hosts!
A relaxed atmosphere with fantastic views, pool, massages in the house, delicious Balinese food, two exciting day trips... We will be happy to come back! Thank you Miryam and Putu!

We had a great time at Miryam's Mushroom Villa.
The villa is super equipped and has everything you need during your holiday to enjoy it to the maximum. Amazing views, several relaxation zones and a great pool. Downstairs is the bedroom as well as the kitchen, upstairs you have a wonderful view including living room. The house is beautiful & tastefully decorated and you can tell that there is love in it. There is also a great music collection that brought us closer to Jimi Hendrix and some other performers. Great!
Since there is no real address for the villa, Yeyen (an acquaintance of Miryam) picked us up, led our driver to the villa and showed us the apartment.
A supermarket, some restaurants and the beach are within walking distance. The surroundings seem to be the original Bali, which was very nice and interesting. Quickly now, before tourism arrives here as well.

Although we did not meet Miryam directly, she was always available and a very loving hostess. She always helped us with any questions.

Overall, we can 100% recommend the property.

The cottage was lovely, also the pool is wonderful. Unfortunately, there was a lot of clinking and built behind the cottage so that we ended up leaving earlier due to noise nuisance. If you are planning to go out during the day, that's no problem.

Wonderfully relaxed and well arranged. great view on cows among the palm trees. Have gone out of his way to get the pool off but we were just a few days early.
Definitely an addition to future guests.
